Package stage4

Class Summary
ClubWorldCup This Class Contains the Main Method of the Application
CompetitorList Competitor List Class that holds all the details of each Competitor in an ArrayList of ContinentChamp(Competitor) Objects.
ContinentChamp This Class Contains Basic methods for the Project with methods to create Full Details, Short Details, getting All Scores of Competitors and getting Overall Scores.
Manager The Manager Class Reads the text file Competitordetails.txt and Writes a report to Final Report.csv
Name Class for the Full names and Short names of the Competitors
